item.title: Potato's Daily Dirties
item.description:
being a problem recently. it fun. figured people could use some memes today.. or just wanna touchie someone elses post on the front page... uwu.
...
...
mhmm
The above image was made by the wonderful CammyJay! They have their own channel in the deviousness discord where they share artwork and sometimes do drawings based on word prompts given by members. its a lot of fun! I has a Deviousness discord server! I caugh a @ShaggyRootsAgain er om. invited them to have a channel where they dump memes now in there. is fun. We do have a hard rule of no politics and/or religion. The discord is a safe space to get away from the bullshit going on. We have a bunch of areas including a SFW area, content creator area, a NSFW area and more! We have gaming fun! We have spontaneous gaming and some ping roles for people to use to get groups together based on US and EU time zones! We have movie nights on Saturdays! So feel free to wander in and say haii! Thank you to everyone who has joined and made it such a unique and special place! Deviousness discord that is 18+: https://discord.gg/deviousness If you have issues with link see dis: https://imgur.com/a/8GUNAz4 Deviousness steam group: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/DeviousnessDiscord
artist of work above (aside from my signing potato on it): https://florahv.artstation.com/projects/XnL8P3 I am on dis now and trying to remember to linky over there too for when I post and also post the memes that get removed: https://bsky.app/profile/potatocheesmonk.bsky.social I has a post with links to all my past posts. enjoy: https://imgur.com/a/ZDA2CBe #deliciousness #potato #memes #dailydirties

item.title: Merry Christmas from me and the snugglebugs from South Carolina
item.description:
It’s going to be 74 (23C) here today
Cowboy at max contentedness. He’d just let one rip, sighed, and went back to snoring
Cowgirl
One of those pitties who cannot control themselves and will maul you with love
My handsome man
Teefs
Both rescues who opened their hearts to each other and their humans. May we all be so brave, and may your hope be answered with love and healing this new year *MV edit: thank you everyone for the sweet messages and the love for the doggos! Hope you all have a wonderful day! Pupdate: Cowgirl and Cowboy both enjoyed stockings full of bones, treats, and toys. Well deserved, of course!

27 Man Tax: Cary Elwes
“A leader takes people where they want to go. A great leader takes people where they don't necessarily want to go, but ought to be.” Rosalynn Carter I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work, zero income. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!
item.dc:creator: MemeMuseumCurator

item.title: 4 Years Difference
item.description: First time posting this on Imgur. These are taken about 4 years apart. I've been on HRT for 3.5 years. I had FFS in 2024 with Facial Team in Marbrlla. I went from being hours away from suicide to being the happiest I've ever been. My marriage has survived my transition, and my wife and I are stronger than ever. I am so happy to still be alive and living that life as the happiest version of myself. Merry Christmas!

item.title: Return of the Meme: 1563ish (two of fucks)
item.description:
Let's get this bread.
No real plans for today: the sky is grey and whispers rain, but we'll see if anything happens.
A reference to Japanese Mythology: earth is situated on a giant catfish and when it twitches, you get earthquakes.
When @racheKatze drew my tarot card for 2025 and it was The Tower, I had no idea I was in for *this* much of a ride and I hope it stops soon... but ive learned a lot about myself and resilience and what I need vs what I want and how to go largely without things I wanted.
I fucking love taking derpy photos of Great Blue Herons. Will likely do another bird photo dump later today, actually.
Birbs are good for America.
I really do wish sometimes that Pot and I got along.
Hah
Probably more like raiding from an elite cigar stash and noticing theyre *all* Davidoff cigars and extremely overrated for the price and then pulling something from my own stash in disgust at their lack of taste.
As someone who is Eastern Orthodox, nothing ive ever done has been approved by the Vatican
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: contented conure grunts while receiving scritches. We have a discord! Pm for the link. ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin
item.dc:creator: CodyBurkett

item.title: Take a break from selfies dump pt.3
item.description:
Here's my speech, yada yada, christmas dump: I have a mixed relationship with selfie day. When I was still with my life, Christmas was spent with her family (non-negotiable), and it was always chaos because her family was crazy, emotional, and always at each others throat. (I later learned the apple doesn't fall far from that tree when I suddenly became the enemy in her eyes at the end of our marriage and all that negativity was directed at me). So my christmases had become pretty hellish, and I wanted to escape it all through imgur. However, the time that I needed imgur the most was designated as selfie day, so there wasn't much in terms of entertainment/escape. Now that I'm out of that relationship, I get my Christmases back, and I get to spend them with my new partner, and they are absolutely fantastic and I couldn't be more in love. Last year, I decided to dump every single image downloaded image on my phone to give respite to any imgurians that were like me. Although I no longer need a Christmas escape, I'd like to bring even a little joys to those who do. I'd like to do that again this. I don't have nearly as mamy images to dump, as I've been trying to limit my time on imgur this year. But I'll still share what I can. Full disclosure, I have not vetted the images I'm dumping, so if anything really strange slips through the cracks... sorry not sorry. They're primarily images I've sent to my partner and some friends, so they shouldn't be too bad, right? Right? Anyways I've rambled enough. Enjoy
Are you a special weirdo that enjoyed this dump? Or perhaps you just want more funny weirdness? Check out the first 2 parts! (Or even the ones from last year).
item.dc:creator: DreadPirateJaceMangrove

item.title: Happy Festivus, you filthy animals
item.description: For someone who’s been here for like 12 years, you’d think I’d have joined the holiday selfie party before now. I’ve always hated the way I look in pictures, and I have bad acne scars on my face. (hello, double dose of self consciousness and body image issues!). Selfies are not my thing, even in the tiniest bit. Anyway … I hope you all have a safe, happy and joyful holiday season! Yes, I already know you sickos are going to leave “Happy Breastivus” jokes in the comments. Dirty, dirty minds!!

An Australian Christmas tradition in some places is when rural fire department trucks tour the suburbs, often with a firefighter dressed as Santa and handing out lollies (candy) to kids. As Aussie Christmas is in summer, a good natured waterfight helps everyone keep cool.

item.title: Merry Christmas!
item.description:
TLDR: AAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHH…. wtf?!…. Ok thanks for letting me get that out, Merry Christmas! ✨ Blooper Video: https://hyperfollow.com/sursie I have officially moved out of TN but sadly I wasn’t able to move with any of my stuff. Recently we got new property management at my old place, for those who’ve been around within the last year or that I’ve had leeengthy convos with in the comments about (let’s call her Cindy because that’s nothing close to her real name) Cindy and how she was never there, never followed through on scheduled meetings and she just didn’t care. Fast forward and around August the company who owns the apartments brings in a whole new team. At first people were pissed because they fine people over the smallest crap (they lied and said our hallway smoke detector was missing or broken. They “replaced it” and charged us $17.50. I WATCHED THEM TEST ALL OF THEM!) but then lease renewals came around and my sister were going about the process of it until we found out that Cindy had never updated the fact that my sister had a full time job nor had she EVER added me to the lease. So she had a year of income unaccounted for on their end and I’d been living there off lease for 2 years. A few weeks back, the new managers assistant came into the store my sister works and got a few small things. She came up to my sisters register and said “Look, I didn’t tell you this ok? But if I were you, I wouldn’t finish that paperwork I’d pack my stuff and get out ASAP. Because if you do, they’re coming after you for just over $7,000. it will ruin your credit and make it hard to rent from another low income place in the future…” So I’d set a date with my Nana and dad to move all my things up North, I would’ve ended up here eventually so it was no surprise for anyone then 2 days before we were supposed to leave, my nana says “I think you should wait until spring. The roads are too dangerous and Im not driving up there in winter”. So last minute someone I know had to get me a plane ticket which was ungodly expensive due to the holidays and I have to pay them back. All my music gear etc is back in TN and Im not sure when I’ll be able to go get anything. A family friend has my harps at her house. So I’m keeping my full discography 50% off for the rest of the year and all sales are going towards being able to drive down and bring everything back. It’s been one hell of a ride but I just have to remind myself to breathe and be patient, things will work out eventually.
Broke out the PVC pants since it’s been awhile for a shiny merry Christmas ✨
item.dc:creator: SursieMetzger

item.title: GovBrief Today #328
item.description: Breaking: Trump reposts on social media 121 times in 83 minutes early Christmas morning. Catholic bishops asked the administration to pause immigration enforcement for Christmas. They got a two-sentence brushoff. That’s better than the numerous death threats Bishop Mariann Budde received in January when she asked for mercy at the inaugural service, but it doesn’t feel like progress. Christmas arrived. ICE shot a driver in Maryland using the same justification that video contradicted in September when they shot someone else. The administration paid $100,000 per person to send 75 migrants to a Pacific island with no way home. They're building warehouse detention for 80,000 in spaces designed for Amazon packages. And the president couldn't talk to children for 20 minutes without relitigating 2020 and warning about "bad Santa" infiltrating the country. They were asked to show mercy. They said no. Then they showed us exactly who they are, stripping away even the thinnest pretense of a holiday season. We've emailed 5,300+ stories over 328 straight nights. Stop hoping the algorithm shows them to you. govbrief.today #GovBriefToday #Resist Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com [1] https://go.govbrief.today/aap-sues-dhs [2] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-migrant-warehouses [3] https://go.govbrief.today/doe-orders-more-coal [4] https://go.govbrief.today/million-epstein-files [5] https://go.govbrief.today/wisc-man-no-crime [6] https://go.govbrief.today/ice-christmas-eve-shooting [7] https://go.govbrief.today/palau-migrant-deal [8] https://go.govbrief.today/trump-santa-calls [9] https://go.govbrief.today/kennedy-center-concert-canceled Subscribe (It's Free!) - https://gbounacos.substack.com
item.dc:creator: GeorgeBounacos
